text: @MarshaBlackburn Nike, NFL, NASCAR, Yeti, were all boycotted by the GOP mob, so do me a favor and STFU, go work on Covid-19 instead of playing to your base.

entity.name: Quaker State 400
entity.description: NASCAR Cup Series drivers compete in the Quaker State 400 at Kentucky Speedway. Kevin Harvick nabbed his third victory in under a month with a July 5 decision in Indiana. Harvick won two of his last three outings, and finished second in the other.
